title: Ban Choopi Please
body: The Player "Choopi" kept saying things like "i hope you die in hell" and "drink bleach" and he also told me to hang my self, which i believe is not what league of legends is about. Thank You - SteveRanas

replies.body: Ban SteveRanas Please. The Player "SteveRanas" kept naming and shaming on the forums saying things like "Ban Choopi Please" and you should open a support ticket. Thank you- Felsummoner
idk know about you but i dont want to drink bleach, would you?
Naming and shaming and nagging on forums isn't going to get you anywhere. Why didn't you just mute the player if they were being toxic? Simple.
because i belive that people like this should be banned and i need to see they r saying so i know what im talking about
theres always that 1 idiot who advocates extreme toxicity on a name and shame thread.
